question: [Detailed] Espanol: Calcula el area y el perimetro del triangulo con vertices (132, 61), (151, 171), (182, 122).

qas.question: [Detailed] Espanol: Calcula el area y el perimetro del triangulo con vertices (132, 61), (151, 171), (182, 122).
[Detailed] Francais: Calculez l'aire et le perimetre du triangle forme par (132, 61), (151, 171), (182, 122). Provide only the area.
[Explain] English: Compute the area and perimeter of the triangle defined by (132, 61), (151, 171), (182, 122). Provide only the perimeter.
